Sales Engineer, with more than 12 years of proven expertise in Industrial Automation & 
Control. Key Account Manager, able to build and strengthen customer relationships to 
achieve goal sales strategies. Superior presentation and interpretation skills, used to 
continuous reporting and forecasting. Efficient sales trainer and communicator, with proven 
ability to manage all the customer relationships phases; pre-sales, training, commissioning 
and aftersales support. 
 
 
Proficiencies  
 Process Automation  
 MS Office Suite, Salesforce, SAP  
 Sales Oriented  
 EPC , OEM, system integrator and 
end users in North of Spain, deep 
customer knowledge in several fields   
 Good Organizational & Time-Management  
 Reporting and forecasting with CRM tools  
 Self-Motivation and Proactivity  
 Good Analytical Skills and reporting
 
 
 
Professional Experience 
 
Territory Sales Engineer / Endress + Hauser 2017 – PRESENT  
 
 Responsible  for  the  development  and  maintenance  of  sales  or  additional  account 
volume in North of Spain Region, via distributors network and direct Key customers. (Galicia 
to Navarra)  Build and strengthen relations with more than 1.000 companies Responsible for 
2.5 M€ / year. 
 Identify and secure new accounts by contacting customers not yet established with the 
company, explaining advantages of company products/services and negotiating agreements. 
 Document account activities, generate reports, and keep records of business with customers 
and suppliers. 
 Sell products and solutions requiring extensive technical expertise and support for 
installation and use, such as Flow, Level, Pressure, Temperature and Analytics Sensors. 
 Provide quotations and negotiate contract terms. 
 Prepare and deliver technical presentations to explain products and services to customers 
and prospective customers. 
 Maintained sale forecasting reports. 
 
  

 
 
Area District Manager / Contaval (Siemens Distributor) 2014 -2017 
 
 Responsible  for  the  development  and  maintenance  of  sales  or  additional  account 
volume in North of Spain Region.  (Basque Country, Navarra and La Rioja)  Build and 
strengthen relationships with more than 400 companies. Responsible for 1.2 M€ / year. 
 Identify and secure new accounts by contacting customers not yet established with the 
company, explaining advantages of company products/services and negotiating agreements. 
 Document account activities, generate reports, and keep records of business with customers 
and suppliers. 
 Sell products and solutions requiring extensive technical expertise and support for 
installation and use, such as detection sensors, machine safety, HMI, PLC, AC Drives, Power 
Sources, etc.  
 Provide quotations and negotiate contract terms. 
 Prepare and deliver technical presentations to explain products and services to customers 
and prospective customers. 
 Maintained sale forecasting reports. 
 
Sales Engineer / Krilinex Power Solutions 2013 
 
 Key Account Manager of large companies in Power Generation and Oil & Gas Industries. Main 
customers: electric power plants maintenance/operations (Iberdrola, Endesa, HC Energía, 
etc.), large engineering firms in EPC projects, and Oil & Gas companies. 
 Design and calculation of tailored applications matching customers’ requirements. On-site 
supervision of installation and commissioning of the equipment and aftersales support. 
 Products: steam conditioning and controlling equipment, process control and 
instrumentation, generator monitoring systems. Users: combined cycles, coal burning, 
nuclear, solar thermal, co- generation power plants, refineries and petrochemical complex. 
 Responsible for all phases in the CRM cycle: market research, problem identification and 
application design including price quotation. Accountable for successful matching of 
customers’ specifications and projects’ results in time, profit and quality. 


career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
